control_attributes.Control: MA-5 (3) CITIZENSHIP REQUIREMENTS FOR CLASSIFIED SYSTEMS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization ensures that personnel performing maintenance and diagnostic activities on an information system processing, storing, or transmitting classified information are U.S. citizens.

Control Statement: The organization ensures that personnel performing maintenance and diagnostic activities on an information system processing, storing, or transmitting classified information are U.S. citizens.
Control Name: MA-5 (3) CITIZENSHIP REQUIREMENTS FOR CLASSIFIED SYSTEMS
